name: Rogue, Venture Out
description:
The latest and likely last installation of the Rogue-like shooter. Control Spaceman through a blue dungeon of hell, fighting skeletons, slimes, fireballs and a few cowards in this EPIC dungeon shooter.

Every dungeon is uniquely built using procedural generation.

Dodge and fire away a machine gun wreck of bullets, destroy boxes for loot, upgrade your health and find the magical portal to exit!

Oh no, the portal is a lie!

(GitHub - Epxitome/RogueShooter: Used a tutorial to create this code. Playable game available at itch.io (see readme) (github.com))

Devlog - The Rogue Lite zip you see is the first time I completed the tutorial. An unfinished prototype at best. See actual devlogs for more info.
